name: Touchtech
description:
We are one of Australia & New Zealand’s leading web, mobile, and smart app companies - delivering apps, machine learning and AI solutions to some of NZ's and Australia’s top companies.
A Deloitte "AsiaPac Fast 500" company for 2 years-in-a-row, we believe strongly in “Delivery, Empathy, and Fun”. We work with you to create simple, beautiful user experiences, designs, and technology engines for your website, applications, and core infrastructure ensuring that the outcome is intuitive, beautiful, and productive.
Our team of skilled designers, technical architects, and highly experienced developers will help realise your ideas and business goals, while applying technology beautifully. 
Please contact us now to see how we can develop your idea and put AI to work for you: office@touchtechlabs.com
